title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Sex abuse leaves parents groping.” [Headline in The Morning Call, Allentown, Pennsylvania, May 21, 1985. Submitted by Alvin J. Olsen, Zionsville, Pennsylvania.]
